Anou-Araren.Description:
Niger is endowed with proven 
coal reserves amounting to more than 
68m t in Salkadamna (Tahoua) with a 
calorific value of 6,000 kcal/kg and over 
20 t in Anou-Araren and Solomi (Agadez).
